# I. Prerequisite
1. MATLAB 2023b | [Document](https://www.mathworks.com/help/releases/R2023b/index.html)
2. Visual Studio 2019 | [Download](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/vs/older-downloads/)
3. UAV Toolbox | [Download}](https://www.mathworks.com/hardware-support/px4-autopilots.html)
4. PX4 Firmware v1.12.3 | [Download](https://github.com/PX4/PX4-windows-toolchain/releases/tag/v0.8)
5. Git | [Download](https://git-scm.com/downloads)
